CustomField.description: If checked, a unique assignment link (i.e. existence of Survey Result record) is not required to respond. Based on other configuration, a user may be able to respond as long as s/he has a right survey response link (for internal user or community user). Note that assigned responders can still be able to respond irrespective of this setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables a participant to respond to the survey by clicking the public survey response link. Does not require the participant to authenticate and identify using her Salesforce credentials.
CustomField.label: Open to Unassigned Participants
